pr_title: Add GE links to the offers panel

timeline.message:
Add GE links to the offers panel

This allows looking up GE prices for items already on offer, without the need to manually search for the item on the Search tab.
Accessed via a new popup menu.

timeline.bodyText: this class seems unnecessary, instead you could just move this function into the plugin.

timeline.bodyText: I believe they recently changed this to always redirect to https, so it may be worth updating it here.
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText:
I also made it use + instead of _ to avoid the redirect.
I.e. compare
https://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_oldschool/Limpwurt+root/viewitem?obj=225
and
https://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_oldschool/Limpwurt_root/viewitem?obj=225
The second redirects to https://secure.runescape.com/m=itemdb_oldschool/a=13/Limpwurt+root/viewitem?obj=225
replies.author: Shingyx

timeline.message: Update GE links to use https, and + instead of _. Remove unnecessary class.

ge plugin: add GE links to the offers panel

This allows looking up GE prices for items already on offer, without the need to manually search for the item on the Search tab.
Accessed via a new popup menu.
